title: NYC’s Poor Air Quality Set to Worsen on Canada Fire Smoke
description: Wildfire smoke from blazes burning in the Canadian prairie has drifted across New York, contributing to air-quality alerts that warn of breathing problems for children and older adults.
content:
(Bloomberg) Wildfire smoke from blazes burning in the Canadian prairie has drifted across New York, contributing to air-quality alerts that warn of breathing problems for children and older adults.
